item.title: This Website
item.description: This website uses hugo, a static website generator. There is no particular reasons for me choosing hugo. There are tons of other solutions available. I needed something simple enough to avoid the hassle of learning a new framework, being static and support of markdown. Google leaded me to hugo. Installation (MacOS) >> brew install hugo Creating a new site hugo new mynewsite Themes Hugo uses themes. I picked up after dark, a minimalist dark theme.
